item.title: About Geert
item.description: Geert van der Cruijsen ðŸ‘‹ Hi i’m Geert van der Cruijsen. I’m a senior consultant working at Xpirit and I love helping others build better software. I do this through my job as a consultant for various companies but I also love to share knowledge in the community as public speaker and writer of articles and this blog. I Like tinkering with new technology and I’m always looking for new ways to improve my skills.
